GE07mbh_16_u:000.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_16_u:001.001a: ṣaṭtriṃśe tv atha saṃprāpte varṣe kauravanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:001.006a: ete cānye ca bahava utpātā bhayaśaṃsinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:001.006d-0002_01: dṛśyante jagato nāthe divam āroḍhum icchati
GE07mbh_16_u:001.006d-0003_01: yasya prasādād dharmo 'yaṃ kṛte yadvat kalāv api
GE07mbh_16_u:001.006d-0003_02: pāṇḍavās tu mahābhāgā yuktās tu yaśasānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:001.007a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:001.008a: vimuktaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca śrutvā rāmaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:001.008c: samānīyābravīd bhrātṝn kiṃ kariṣyāma ity uta
GE07mbh_16_u:001.009c: vṛṣṇīn vinaṣṭāṃs te śrutvā vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavābhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:001.010c: vīrā na śraddadhus tasya vināśaṃ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.001a: kathaṃ vinaṣṭā bhagavann andhakā vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:002.002a: ṣaṭtriṃśe 'tha tato varṣe vṛṣṇīnām anayo mahān
GE07mbh_16_u:002.002c: anyonyaṃ musalais te tu nijaghnuḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.003a: kenānuśaptās te vīrāḥ kṣayaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.003c: bhojāś ca dvijavarya tvaṃ vistareṇa vadasva me
GE07mbh_16_u:002.004a: viśvāmitraṃ ca kaṇvaṃ ca nāradaṃ ca tapodhanam
GE07mbh_16_u:002.005a: te vai sāmbaṃ puraskṛtya bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_16_u:002.006c: ṛṣayaḥ sādhu jānīta kim iyaṃ janayiṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:002.007a: ity uktās te tadā rājan vipralambhapradharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.007c: pratyabruvaṃs tān munayo yat tac chṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_16_u:002.010a: samudraṃ yāsyati śrīmāṃs tyaktvā dehaṃ halāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.010c: jarā kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi bhetsyati
GE07mbh_16_u:002.011a: ity abruvanta te rājan pralabdhās tair durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.012a: tathoktvā munayas te tu tataḥ keśavam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.013c: antajño matimāṃs tasya bhavitavyaṃ tatheti tān
GE07mbh_16_u:002.014a: evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ praviveśa punar gṛhān
GE07mbh_16_u:002.014c: kṛtāntam anyathā naicchat kartuṃ sa jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.015a: śvobhūte 'tha tataḥ sāmbo musalaṃ tad asūta vai
GE07mbh_16_u:002.016a: prasūtaṃ śāpajaṃ ghoraṃ tac ca rājñe nyavedayan
GE07mbh_16_u:002.016c: viṣaṇṇarūpas tad rājā sūkṣmaṃ cūrṇam akārayat
GE07mbh_16_u:002.017a: prākṣipan sāgare tac ca puruṣā rājaśāsanāt
GE07mbh_16_u:002.017b-0006_01: tac cūrṇaṃ sāgare cāpi prākṣipan puruṣā nṛpa
GE07mbh_16_u:002.017b-0007_01: jajñe sāve[va?]rakāś cūrṇaṃ prakḷptaṃ tair mahodadhau
GE07mbh_16_u:002.017c: aghoṣayaṃś ca nagare vacanād āhukasya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:002.019a: yaś ca no 'viditaṃ kuryāt peyaṃ kaś cin naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_16_u:002.019c: jīvan sa śūlam ārohet svayaṃ kṛtvā sabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:002.020a: tato rājabhayāt sarve niyamaṃ cakrire tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:002.020c: narāḥ śāsanam ājñāya tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:003.002c: gṛhāṇy avekṣya vṛṣṇīnāṃ nādṛśyata punaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_16_u:003.002d-0011_02: na cāśakyata veddhuṃ sa sarvabhūtātyayas tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:003.003a: utpedire mahāvātā dāruṇāś cā dine dine
GE07mbh_16_u:003.004b-0012_01: keśā nakhāś ca suptānām adyante mūṣakair niśi
GE07mbh_16_u:003.004e: nopaśāmyati śabdaś ca sa divārātram eva hi
GE07mbh_16_u:003.005c: ajāḥ śivānāṃ ca rutam anvakurvata bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:003.007c: śunīṣv api biḍālāś ca mūṣakā nakulīṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:003.008c: prādviṣan brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi pitṝn devāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:003.009a: gurūṃś cāpy avamanyanta na tu rāmajanārdanau
GE07mbh_16_u:003.009c: patnyaḥ patīn vyuccaranta patnīś ca patayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:003.013a: puṇyāhe vācyamāne ca japatsu ca mahātmasu
GE07mbh_16_u:003.013c: abhidhāvantaḥ śrūyante na cādṛśyata kaś cana
GE07mbh_16_u:003.014a: parasparaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ hanyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:003.014c: grahair apaśyan sarve te nātmanas tu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_16_u:003.016c: trayodaśyām amāvāsyāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā prābravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:003.017c: tadā ca bhārate yuddhe prāptā cādya kṣayāya naḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:003.018a: vimṛśann eva kālaṃ taṃ paricintya janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:003.018c: mene prāptaṃ sa ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ varṣaṃ vai keśisūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:003.020a: idaṃ ca tad anuprāptam abravīd yad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:003.020d-0014_02: puṇyakarmaprayogāc ca nānyac chreyo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_16_u:003.021a: ity uktvā vāsudevas tu cikīrṣan satyam eva tat
GE07mbh_16_u:004.001a: kālī strī pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ praviśya hasatī niśi
GE07mbh_16_u:004.001d-0016_01: kurvanto bhīṣaṇān nādān karālāś cāpy asaṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.001d-0016_02: tathā dviśiraso raudrāś caturbāhava eva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:004.001d-0016_03: strīṇāṃ garbheṣu jāyante rākṣasā guhyakās tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.002a: alaṃkārāś ca chatraṃ ca dhvajāś ca kavacāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:004.003c: divam ācakrame cakraṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.004a: yuktaṃ rathaṃ divyam ādityavarṇaṃ; hayāharan paśyato dārukasya
GE07mbh_16_u:004.004c: te sāgarasyopariṣṭhād avartan; manojavāś caturo vājimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.005a: tālaḥ suparṇaś ca mahādhvajau tau; supūjitau rāmajanārdanābhyām
GE07mbh_16_u:004.005c: uccair jahrur apsaraso divāniśaṃ; vācaś cocur gamyatāṃ tīrthayātrā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.005d-0017_02: divaḥ praveśanārthaṃ te vimānair divam āyayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.007a: tato bhojyaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ ca peyaṃ cāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.007c: bahu nānāvidhaṃ cakrur madyaṃ māṃsam anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.008a: tataḥ sīdhuṣu saktāś ca niryayur nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.008c: yānair aśvair gajaiś caiva śrīmantas tigmatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.010a: niviṣṭāṃs tān niśamyātha samudrānte sa yogavit
GE07mbh_16_u:004.011c: jānan vināśaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ naicchad vārayituṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.013a: brāhmaṇārtheṣu yat siddham annaṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_16_u:004.015c: apibad yuyudhānaś ca gado babhrus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:004.017a: kaḥ kṣatriyo manyamānaḥ suptān hanyān mṛtān iva
GE07mbh_16_u:004.017c: na tan mṛṣyanti hārdikya yādavā yat tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_16_u:004.017d-0018_01: na tan mṛṣyati hārdikyo yad avocat tadā ruṣā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.018a: ity ukte yuyudhānena pūjayām āsa tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.018c: pradyumno rathināṃ śreṣṭho hārdikyam avamanya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:004.019c: nirdiśann iva sāvajñaṃ tadā savyena pāṇinā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.021a: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā keśavaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.021c: tiryak saroṣayā dṛṣṭyā vīkṣāṃ cakre sa manyumān
GE07mbh_16_u:004.022a: maṇiḥ syamantakaś caiva yaḥ sa satrājito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_16_u:004.022c: tāṃ kathāṃ smārayām āsa sātyakir madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_16_u:004.023a: tac chrutvā keśavasyāṅkam agamad rudatī tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.024a: tata utthāya sakrodhaḥ sātyakir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:004.025a: eṣa gacchāmi padavīṃ satyena ca tathā śape
GE07mbh_16_u:004.025c: sauptike ye ca nihatāḥ suptānena durātmanā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.026c: samāptam āyur asyādya yaśaś cāpi sumadhyame
GE07mbh_16_u:004.030a: tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇam abhikruddhāñ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.030c: na cukrodha mahātejā jānan kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:004.031a: te tu pānamadāviṣṭāś coditāś caiva manyunā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.033a: sa bhojaiḥ saha saṃyuktaḥ sātyakiś cāndhakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:004.033c: bahutvān nihatau tatra ubhau kṛṣṇasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.034a: hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tu śaineyaṃ putraṃ ca yadunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.034c: erakāṇāṃ tadā muṣṭiṃ kopāj jagrāha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.035a: tad abhūn musalaṃ ghoraṃ vajrakalpam ayomayam
GE07mbh_16_u:004.035c: jaghāna tena kṛṣṇas tān ye 'sya pramukhato 'bhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:004.036a: tato 'ndhakāś ca bhojāś ca śaineyā vṛṣṇayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:004.037a: yas teṣām erakāṃ kaś cij jagrāha ruṣito nṛpa
GE07mbh_16_u:004.037c: vajrabhūteva sā rājann adṛśyata tadā vibho
GE07mbh_16_u:004.038a: tṛṇaṃ ca musalībhūtam api tatra vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_16_u:004.038c: brahmadaṇḍakṛtaṃ sarvam iti tad viddhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_16_u:004.039a: āvidhyāvidhya te rājan prakṣipanti sma yat tṛṇam
GE07mbh_16_u:004.039c: tad vajrabhūtaṃ musalaṃ vyadṛśyata tadā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_16_u:004.040a: avadhīt pitaraṃ putraḥ pitā putraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:004.041a: pataṃgā iva cāgnau te nyapatan kukurāndhakāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.041c: nāsīt palāyane buddhir vadhyamānasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_16_u:004.042a: taṃ tu paśyan mahābāhur jānan kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:004.043a: sāmbaṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā cārudeṣṇaṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.043c: pradyumnaṃ cāniruddhaṃ ca tataś cukrodha bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:004.044a: gadaṃ vīkṣya śayānaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ kopasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:004.045c: dārukaś caiva dāśārham ūcatur yan nibodha tat
GE07mbh_16_u:004.046a: bhagavan saṃhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā bhūyiṣṭham acyuta
GE07mbh_16_u:004.046c: rāmasya padam anviccha tatra gacchāma yatra saḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.001a: tato yayur dārukaḥ keśavaś ca; babhruś ca rāmasya padaṃ patantaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.001c: athāpaśyan rāmam anantavīryaṃ; vṛkṣe sthitaṃ cintayānaṃ vivikte
GE07mbh_16_u:005.002a: tataḥ samāsādya mahānubhāvaḥ; kṛṣṇas tadā dārukam anvaśāsat
GE07mbh_16_u:005.002c: gatvā kurūñ śīghram imaṃ mahāntaṃ; pārthāya śaṃsasva vadhaṃ yadūnām
GE07mbh_16_u:005.003a: tato 'rjunaḥ kṣipram ihopayātu; śrutvā mṛtān yādavān brahmaśāpāt
GE07mbh_16_u:005.003c: ity evam uktaḥ sa yayau rathena; kurūṃs tadā dāruko naṣṭacetāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.004a: tato gate dāruke keśavo 'tha; dṛṣṭvāntike babhrum uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_16_u:005.004c: striyo bhavān rakṣatu yātu śīghraṃ; naitā hiṃsyur dasyavo vittalobhāt
GE07mbh_16_u:005.005a: sa prasthitaḥ keśavenānuśiṣṭo; madāturo jñātivadhārditaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:005.005c: taṃ vai yāntaṃ saṃnidhau keśavasya; tvarantam ekaṃ sahasaiva babhrum
GE07mbh_16_u:005.005e: brahmānuśaptam avadhīn mahad vai; kūṭonmuktaṃ musalaṃ lubdhakasya
GE07mbh_16_u:005.006a: tato dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ babhrum āha; kṛṣṇo vākyaṃ bhrātaram agrajaṃ tu
GE07mbh_16_u:005.006c: ihaiva tvaṃ māṃ pratīkṣasva rāma; yāvat striyo jñātivaśāḥ karomi
GE07mbh_16_u:005.007a: tataḥ purīṃ dvāravatīṃ praviśya; janārdanaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vākyam
GE07mbh_16_u:005.007c: striyo bhavān rakṣatu naḥ samagrā; dhanaṃjayasyāgamanaṃ pratīkṣan
GE07mbh_16_u:005.007e: rāmo vanānte pratipālayan mām; āste 'dyāhaṃ tena samāgamiṣye
GE07mbh_16_u:005.008a: dṛṣṭaṃ mayedaṃ nidhanaṃ yadūnāṃ; rājñāṃ ca pūrvaṃ kurupuṃgavānām
GE07mbh_16_u:005.008c: nāhaṃ vinā yadubhir yādavānāṃ; purīm imāṃ draṣṭum ihādya śaktaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.009a: tapaś cariṣyāmi nibodha tan me; rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ vanam abhyupetya
GE07mbh_16_u:005.009c: itīdam uktvā śirasāsya pādau; saṃspṛśya kṛṣṇas tvarito jagāma
GE07mbh_16_u:005.010a: tato mahān ninadaḥ prādurāsīt; sastrīkumārasya purasya tasya
GE07mbh_16_u:005.010c: athābravīt keśavaḥ saṃnivartya; śabdaṃ śrutvā yoṣitāṃ krośatīnām
GE07mbh_16_u:005.011a: purīm imām eṣyati savyasācī; sa vo duḥkhān mocayitā narāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.011c: tato gatvā keśavas taṃ dadarśa; rāmaṃ vane sthitam ekaṃ vivikte
GE07mbh_16_u:005.012a: athāpaśyad yogayuktasya tasya; nāgaṃ mukhān niḥsarantaṃ mahāntam
GE07mbh_16_u:005.012c: śvetaṃ yayau sa tataḥ prekṣyamāṇo; mahārṇavo yena mahānubhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.013a: sahasraśīrṣaḥ parvatābhogavarṣmā; raktānanaḥ svāṃ tanuṃ tāṃ vimucya
GE07mbh_16_u:005.013c: samyak ca taṃ sāgaraḥ pratyagṛhṇān; nāgā divyāḥ saritaś caiva puṇyāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.014a: karkoṭako vāsukis takṣakaś ca; pṛthuśravā varuṇaḥ kuñjaraś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:005.014c: miśrī śaṅkhaḥ kumudaḥ puṇḍarīkas; tathā nāgo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahātmā
GE07mbh_16_u:005.015a: hrādaḥ krāthaḥ śitikaṇṭho 'gratejās; tathā nāgau cakramandātiṣaṇḍau
GE07mbh_16_u:005.015c: nāgaśreṣṭho durmukhaś cāmbarīṣaḥ; svayaṃ rājā varuṇaś cāpi rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:005.016a: tato gate bhrātari vāsudevo; jānan sarvā gatayo divyadṛṣṭiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.016c: vane śūnye vicaraṃś cintayāno; bhūmau tataḥ saṃviveśāgryatejāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.017a: sarvaṃ hi tena prāk tadā vittam āsīd; gāndhāryā yad vākyam uktaḥ sa pūrvam
GE07mbh_16_u:005.017c: durvāsasā pāyasocchiṣṭalipte; yac cāpy uktaṃ tac ca sasmāra kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.018c: mene tataḥ saṃkramaṇasya kālaṃ; tataś cakārendriyasaṃnirodham
GE07mbh_16_u:005.019a: sa saṃniruddhendriyavāṅmanās tu; śiśye mahāyogam upetya kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.019c: jarātha taṃ deśam upājagāma; lubdhas tadānīṃ mṛgalipsur ugraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.020a: sa keśavaṃ yogayuktaṃ śayānaṃ; mṛgāśaṅkī lubdhakaḥ sāyakena
GE07mbh_16_u:005.020c: jarāvidhyat pādatale tvarāvāṃs; taṃ cābhitas taj jighṛkṣur jagāma
GE07mbh_16_u:005.021a: matvātmānam aparāddhaṃ sa tasya; jagrāha pādau śirasā cārtarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.021c: āśvāsayat taṃ mahātmā tadānīṃ; gacchann ūrdhvaṃ rodasī vyāpya lakṣmyā
GE07mbh_16_u:005.022a: divaṃ prāptaṃ vāsavo 'thāśvinau ca; rudrādityā vasavaś cātha viśve
GE07mbh_16_u:005.022c: pratyudyayur munayaś cāpi siddhā; gandharvamukhyāś ca sahāpsarobhiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.023a: tato rājan bhagavān ugratejā; nārāyaṇaḥ prabhavaś cāvyayaś ca
GE07mbh_16_u:005.023c: yogācāryo rodasī vyāpya lakṣmyā; sthānaṃ prāpa svaṃ mahātmāprameyam
GE07mbh_16_u:005.024a: tato devair ṛṣibhiś cāpi kṛṣṇaḥ; samāgataś cāraṇaiś caiva rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:005.024c: gandharvāgryair apsarobhir varābhiḥ; siddhaiḥ sādhyaiś cānataiḥ pūjyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:005.025a: te vai devāḥ pratyanandanta rājan; muniśreṣṭhā vāgbhir ānarcur īśam
GE07mbh_16_u:005.025c: gandharvāś cāpy upatasthuḥ stuvantaḥ; prītyā cainaṃ puruhūto 'bhyanandat
GE07mbh_16_u:005.025d-001_0011: vāṇī hy āsīt saṃśritā rūpiṇī sā
GE07mbh_16_u:005.025d-001_0012: bhānor madhye praviśa tvaṃ tu rājan
GE07mbh_16_u:006.001a: dāruko 'pi kurūn gatvā dṛṣṭvā pārthān mahārathān
GE07mbh_16_u:006.003a: tato 'rjunas tān āmantrya keśavasya priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_16_u:006.003c: prayayau mātulaṃ draṣṭuṃ nedam astīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:006.004a: sa vṛṣṇinilayaṃ gatvā dārukeṇa saha prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:006.004c: dadarśa dvārakāṃ vīro mṛtanāthām iva striyam
GE07mbh_16_u:006.005a: yāḥ sma tā lokanāthena nāthavatyaḥ purābhavan
GE07mbh_16_u:006.005c: tās tv anāthās tadā nāthaṃ pārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:006.005d-0034_01: arjunaṃ tāḥ sma nāthaṃ ca dṛṣṭvānāthaṃ vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:006.007a: tās tu dṛṣṭvaiva kauravyo bāṣpeṇa pihito 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:006.007c: hīnāḥ kṛṣṇena putraiś ca nāśakat so 'bhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_16_u:006.012a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvārakāṃ pārthas tāś ca kṛṣṇasya yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:006.013a: sātrājitī tataḥ satyā rukmiṇī ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_16_u:006.014a: tatas tāḥ kāñcane pīṭhe samutthāyopaveśya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:006.015a: tataḥ saṃstūya govindaṃ kathayitvā ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:006.015c: āśvāsya tāḥ striyaś cāpi mātulaṃ draṣṭum abhyagāt
GE07mbh_16_u:007.002d-0035_02: svasrīyasya mahābāhur na śaśāka ca śatruhan
GE07mbh_16_u:007.003c: rudan putrān smaran sarvān vilalāpa suvihvalaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.003e: bhrātṝn putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca dauhitrāṃś ca sakhīn api
GE07mbh_16_u:007.004a: yair jitā bhūmipālāś ca daityāś ca śataśo 'rjuna
GE07mbh_16_u:007.004c: tān dṛṣṭvā neha paśyāmi jīvāmy arjuna durmaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.005a: yau tāv arjuna śiṣyau te priyau bahumatau sadā
GE07mbh_16_u:007.005c: tayor apanayāt pārtha vṛṣṇayo nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.006a: yau tau vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ dvāv evātirathau matau
GE07mbh_16_u:007.006c: pradyumno yuyudhānaś ca kathayan katthase ca yau
GE07mbh_16_u:007.007a: nityaṃ tvaṃ kuruśārdūla kṛṣṇaś ca mama putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.007c: tāv ubhau vṛṣṇināśasya mukham āstāṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_16_u:007.008a: na tu garhāmi śaineyaṃ hārdikyaṃ cāham arjuna
GE07mbh_16_u:007.008c: akrūraṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ ca śāpo hy evātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_16_u:007.009a: keśinaṃ yas tu kaṃsaṃ ca vikramya jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.009c: videhāv akarot pārtha caidyaṃ ca balagarvitam
GE07mbh_16_u:007.010c: gāndhārān kāśirājaṃ ca marubhūmau ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011a: prācyāṃś ca dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca pārvatīyāṃs tathā nṛpān
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_01: tvaṃ hi taṃ nāradaś caiva munayaś ca sanātanam
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_03: pratyapaśyac ca sa vibhur jñātikṣayam adhokṣajaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_04: upaprekṣitavān nityaṃ svayaṃ sa mama putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_05: gāndhāryā vacanaṃ yat tad ṛṣīṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_06: tan nūnam anyathā kartuṃ naicchat sa jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_07: pratyakṣaṃ bhavataś cāpi tava pautraḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_08: aśvatthāmnā hataś cāpi jīvitas tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_16_u:007.011d-0036_09: imāṃs tu naicchat svāñ jñātīn rakṣituṃ sa sakhā tava
GE07mbh_16_u:007.012a: tataḥ putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca bhrātṝn atha sakhīn api
GE07mbh_16_u:007.012c: śayānān nihatān dṛṣṭvā tato mām abravīd idam
GE07mbh_16_u:007.014a: ākhyeyaṃ tasya yad vṛttaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ vaiśasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_16_u:007.014c: sa tu śrutvā mahātejā yadūnām anayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:007.014e: āgantā kṣipram eveha na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_16_u:007.015a: yo 'haṃ tam arjunaṃ viddhi yo 'rjunaḥ so 'ham eva tu
GE07mbh_16_u:007.015b-0037_01: yathā jīvaṃ paraṃ brahma mahāvākyasya niścayāt
GE07mbh_16_u:007.015c: yad brūyāt tat tathā kāryam iti budhyasva mādhava
GE07mbh_16_u:007.016a: sa strīṣu prāptakālaṃ vaḥ pāṇḍavo bālakeṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:007.017a: imāṃ ca nagarīṃ sadyaḥ pratiyāte dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_16_u:007.018a: ahaṃ hi deśe kasmiṃś cit puṇye niyamam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.018c: kālaṃ kartā sadya eva rāmeṇa saha dhīmatā
GE07mbh_16_u:007.019c: hitvā māṃ bālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ diśaṃ kām apy agāt prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.020a: so 'haṃ tau ca mahātmānau cintayan bhrātarau tava
GE07mbh_16_u:007.020c: ghoraṃ jñātivadhaṃ caiva na bhuñje śokakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:007.021a: na ca bhokṣye na jīviṣye diṣṭyā prāpto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_16_u:007.021c: yad uktaṃ pārtha kṛṣṇena tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_16_u:007.022a: etat te pārtha rājyaṃ ca striyo ratnāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_16_u:007.022b-0038_02: tair hīnāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭuṃ na ca śakṣyāmi phalguna
GE07mbh_16_u:007.022c: iṣṭān prāṇān ahaṃ hīmāṃs tyakṣyāmi ripusūdana
GE07mbh_16_u:008.001a: evam uktaḥ sa bībhatsur mātulena paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.002c: vihīnāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktaś ciram iha prabho
GE07mbh_16_u:008.003a: rājā ca bhīmasenaś ca sahadevaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.003c: nakulo yājñasenī ca ṣaḍ ekamanaso vayam
GE07mbh_16_u:008.004a: rājñaḥ saṃkramaṇe cāpi kālo 'yaṃ vartate dhruvam
GE07mbh_16_u:008.004c: tam imaṃ viddhi saṃprāptaṃ kālaṃ kālavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_16_u:008.005a: sarvathā vṛṣṇidārāṃs tu bālavṛddhāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:008.006a: ity uktvā dārukam idaṃ vākyam āha dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.007a: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ sudharmāṃ yādavīṃ sabhām
GE07mbh_16_u:008.008a: tam āsanagataṃ tatra sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.009c: uvācedaṃ vacaḥ pārthaḥ svayaṃ dīnataras tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.010c: idaṃ tu nagaraṃ sarvaṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:008.012a: saptame divase caiva ravau vimala udgate
GE07mbh_16_u:008.013c: sajjam āśu tataś cakruḥ svasiddhyarthaṃ samutsukāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.014a: tāṃ rātrim avasat pārthaḥ keśavasya niveśane
GE07mbh_16_u:008.016a: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd vasudevasya veśmani
GE07mbh_16_u:008.016c: dāruṇaḥ krośatīnāṃ ca rudatīnāṃ ca yoṣitām
GE07mbh_16_u:008.017c: urāṃsi pāṇibhir ghnantyo vyalapan karuṇaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.018a: taṃ devakī ca bhadrā ca rohiṇī madirā tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.019c: yānena mahatā pārtho bahir niṣkrāmayat tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.021c: purastāt tasya yānasya yājakāś ca tato yayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.022a: anujagmuś ca taṃ vīraṃ devyas tā vai svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.023a: yas tu deśaḥ priyas tasya jīvato 'bhūn mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.025a: taṃ vai catasṛbhiḥ strībhir anvitaṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.025c: adāhayac candanaiś ca gandhair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_16_u:008.026c: sāmagānāṃ ca nirghoṣo narāṇāṃ rudatām api
GE07mbh_16_u:008.027c: sarva evodakaṃ cakruḥ striyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.028a: aluptadharmas taṃ dharmaṃ kārayitvā sa phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.029a: sa tān dṛṣṭvā nipatitān kadane bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.030a: yathāpradhānataś caiva cakre sarvāḥ kriyās tadā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.030d-0039_01: tato bhagavato dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā śiṣyaḥ pralapya ca
GE07mbh_16_u:008.032a: sa teṣāṃ vidhivat kṛtvā pretakāryāṇi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.032c: saptame divase prāyād ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.034a: bhṛtyās tv andhakavṛṣṇīnāṃ sādino rathinaś ca ye
GE07mbh_16_u:008.035a: kuñjaraiś ca gajārohā yayuḥ śailanibhais tathā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.036c: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.037c: puraskṛtya yayur vajraṃ pautraṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.038a: bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040a: niryāte tu jane tasmin sāgaro makarālayaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0041_01: yad yad dhi puruṣavyāghro bhūmes tasyā vyamuñcata
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0041_02: tat tat saṃplāvayām āsa salilena sa sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0042_01: abravīc ca tadā sarvān prāṇinas tatra sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0042_03: bhājanāni ca haimāni raupyāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0042_05: saveśmakā purī ceyaṃ hareḥ pālyā mayādhunā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0042_06: punar yatrāvatāraś ca bhaviṣyati kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_16_u:008.040d-0042_07: kośādhyakṣo 'smy ahaṃ tasya tasyaitāny api no dhanam
GE07mbh_16_u:008.041c: tūrṇāt tūrṇataraṃ jagmur aho daivam iti bruvan
GE07mbh_16_u:008.042a: kānaneṣu ca ramyeṣu parvateṣu nadīṣu ca
GE07mbh_16_u:008.046c: nayaty asmān atikramya yodhāś ceme hataujasaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.046d-0044_02: jitvā śakraṃ ca rudraṃ ca so 'smān adyāvamanyate
GE07mbh_16_u:008.049c: uvāca tān mahābāhur arjunaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_16_u:008.050a: nivartadhvam adharmajñā yadi stha na mumūrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.051a: tathoktās tena vīreṇa kadarthīkṛtya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.051c: abhipetur janaṃ mūḍhā vāryamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.052a: tato 'rjuno dhanur divyaṃ gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_16_u:008.052b-0045_01: ākroṣṭuṃ nāśakaj jiṣṇuḥ sarvaprāṇaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:008.052c: āropayitum ārebhe yatnād iva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_16_u:008.053a: cakāra sajyaṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃbhrame tumule sati
GE07mbh_16_u:008.053a-0046_02: tvagbhedaṃ na śarāś cakrur astā gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_16_u:008.053c: cintayām āsa cāstrāṇi na ca sasmāra tāny api
GE07mbh_16_u:008.054a: vaikṛtyaṃ tan mahad dṛṣṭvā bhujavīrye tathā yudhi
GE07mbh_16_u:008.055c: na śekur āvartayituṃ hriyamāṇaṃ ca taṃ janam
GE07mbh_16_u:008.056a: kalatrasya bahutvāt tu saṃpatatsu tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.058c: jaghāna dasyūn sodvego vṛṣṇibhṛtyaiḥ saha prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.059a: kṣaṇena tasya te rājan kṣayaṃ jagmur ajihmagāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.059c: akṣayā hi purā bhūtvā kṣīṇāḥ kṣatajabhojanāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.061c: jagmur ādāya te mlecchāḥ samantāj janamejaya
GE07mbh_16_u:008.062a: dhanaṃjayas tu daivaṃ tan manasācintayat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.064a: babhūva vimanāḥ pārtho daivam ity anucintayan
GE07mbh_16_u:008.064c: nyavartata tato rājan nedam astīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_16_u:008.065a: tataḥ sa śeṣam ādāya kalatrasya mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.068a: tato vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca striyaś cādāya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:008.068c: vīrair vihīnān sarvāṃs tāñ śakraprasthe nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_16_u:008.071a: rukmiṇī tv atha gāndhārī śaibyā haimavatīty api
GE07mbh_16_u:008.073a: dvārakāvāsino ye tu puruṣāḥ pārtham anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.002a: sa tam āsādya dharmajñam upatasthe mahāvratam
GE07mbh_16_u:009.003a: svāgataṃ te 'stv iti prāha muniḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.004d-0052_01: paricārakeṣu yaḥ kaś cit tiṣṭhann eva vinidritaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.004d-0052_03: sarvopaniṣadām arthaṃ yo brūte sa mahāguruḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.005a: avīrajo 'bhighātas te brāhmaṇo vā hatas tvayā
GE07mbh_16_u:009.005c: yuddhe parājito vāsi gataśrīr iva lakṣyase
GE07mbh_16_u:009.006a: na tvā pratyabhijānāmi kim idaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:009.006c: śrotavyaṃ cen mayā pārtha kṣipram ākhyātum arhasi vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.006d-0053_01: tataḥ pārtho viniḥśvasya śrūyatāṃ bhagavan iti
GE07mbh_16_u:009.007c: sa kṛṣṇaḥ saha rāmeṇa tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.007d-0054_01: tad anusmṛtya saṃmohaṃ sadā śokaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_16_u:009.007d-0055_02: yatprabhāveṇa nirdagdhāḥ sa kṛṣṇas tyaktavān bhuvam
GE07mbh_16_u:009.009a: ye te śūrā mahātmānaḥ siṃhadarpā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.009c: bhojavṛṣṇyandhakā brahmann anyonyaṃ tair hataṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_16_u:009.010c: ta erakābhir nihatāḥ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_16_u:009.012a: punaḥ punar na mṛśyāmi vināśam amitaujasām
GE07mbh_16_u:009.012c: cintayāno yadūnāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.013c: nabhasaḥ patanaṃ caiva śaityam agnes tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_16_u:009.014c: na ceha sthātum icchāmi loke kṛṣṇavinākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.015a: itaḥ kaṣṭataraṃ cānyac chṛṇu tad vai tapodhana
GE07mbh_16_u:009.015c: mano me dīryate yena cintayānasya vai muhuḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.016a: paśyato vṛṣṇidārāś ca mama brahman sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.017a: dhanur ādāya tatrāhaṃ nāśakaṃ tasya pūraṇe
GE07mbh_16_u:009.017c: yathā purā ca me vīryaṃ bhujayor na tathābhavat
GE07mbh_16_u:009.018c: śarāś ca kṣayam āpannāḥ kṣaṇenaiva samantataḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.018d-0056_01: tad dhanus tāni cāstrāṇi sa rathas te ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.018d-0056_02: sarvam ekapade bhraṣṭaṃ dānam aśrotriye yathā
GE07mbh_16_u:009.020a: yaḥ sa yāti purastān me rathasya sumahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.020c: pradahan ripusainyāni na paśyāmy aham adya tam
GE07mbh_16_u:009.022a: tam apaśyan viṣīdāmi ghūrṇāmīva ca sattama
GE07mbh_16_u:009.023a: vinā janārdanaṃ vīraṃ nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_16_u:009.023c: śrutvaiva hi gataṃ viṣṇuṃ mamāpi mumuhur diśaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.024c: upadeṣṭuṃ mama śreyo bhavān arhati sattama vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_16_u:009.025-0058_01: devāṃśā devadevena saṃbhūtās te gatāḥ saha
GE07mbh_16_u:009.025c: vinaṣṭāḥ kuruśārdūla na tāñ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_16_u:009.026a: bhavitavyaṃ tathā tad dhi diṣṭam etan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_16_u:009.027a: trailokyam api kṛṣṇo hi kṛtsnaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_16_u:009.027c: prasahed anyathā kartuṃ kim u śāpaṃ manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_16_u:009.027d-0059_01: striyaś ca tāḥ purā śaptāḥ prahāsakupitena vai
GE07mbh_16_u:009.028a: rathasya purato yāti yaḥ sa cakragadādharaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.029c: mokṣayitvā jagat sarvaṃ gataḥ svasthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_16_u:009.030a: tvayā tv iha mahat karma devānāṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:009.031a: kṛtakṛtyāṃś ca vo manye saṃsiddhān kurupuṃgava
GE07mbh_16_u:009.031c: gamanaṃ prāptakālaṃ ca tad dhi śreyo mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_16_u:009.032a: balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:009.032d-0060_02: te mām arjuna kālotthakarmaṇābhibhavo na saḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.032d-0060_03: tvayā yat kauravā dhvastā yadābhīrair bhavāñ jitaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.033c: kāla eva samādatte punar eva yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_16_u:009.034a: sa eva balavān bhūtvā punar bhavati durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.034c: sa eveśaś ca bhūtveha parair ājñāpyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_16_u:009.035c: punar eṣyanti te hastaṃ yadā kālo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_16_u:009.036a: kālo gantuṃ gatiṃ mukhyāṃ bhavatām api bhārata
GE07mbh_16_u:009.036c: etac chreyo hi vo manye paramaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_16_u:009.038a: praviśya ca purīṃ vīraḥ samāsādya yudhiṣṭhiram
